data.actual_result: The "No game detected" is fine but the "What are you playing?" is harder to see
data.expected_result: The text in the grey box should be easily readable
data.short_description: The "What are you playing?" text is a bit darker on Light theme making it harder to see
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Light theme - Go to Games section of user settings  - Make sure it says No game detected
